mention.text: Path guerrillas who dominate Peru 's Upper Huallaga River Valley have brought Path guerrillas who dominate Peru 's Upper Huallaga River Valley own law and order to a cocaine-corrupted , violence-ridden region With a system Path guerrillas who dominate Peru 's Upper Huallaga River Valley call '' revolutionary justice , '' Path guerrillas who dominate Peru 's Upper Huallaga River Valley have banned drug abuse , prostitution , homosexuality and thievery from the villages they control '' Two years ago you could not travel the roads without being held up
the Huallaga Valley Peru 's Upper Huallaga

Peru 's Upper Huallaga River Valley own law and order to a cocaine-corrupted , violence-ridden region With a system Path guerrillas who dominate Peru 's Upper Huallaga River Valley call '' revolutionary justice , '' Path guerrillas who dominate Peru 's Upper Huallaga River Valley have banned drug abuse , prostitution , homosexuality and thievery from the villages they control '' Two years ago you could not travel the roads without being held up
Path guerrillas who dominate Peru 's Upper Huallaga River Valley have banned drug abuse
Path guerrillas who dominate Peru 's Upper Huallaga River Valley killed a few bandits and the rest got the message

a Shining Path political officer , who spoke only on condition the local police who take what they want without ever offering to pay not be identified , gave an example of the kind of law the guerrillas have laid down : ''
a Canadian Roman Catholic priest working in Aucayacu
an agronomist in Tingo Maria , explaining the effects of '' revolutionary justice
